title: Parent Document Retriever using Elasticsearch as Vector Store for Child Chunks and Local Filestore as Docstore for Parent Chunks
author: Abhijeet Gorai
description:
The code has a ContextRetriever class which leverages the Parent Document Retriever, employing Elasticsearch as a Vector Store for Child Chunks and utilizing a Local Filestore as the Docstore for Parent Chunks.
There is also option for metadata filter while retrieving relevant chunks.
The function get_relevant_docs_with_similarity gives relevant documents along with similarity scores.

installDependencyCommands: pip install python-dotenv==1.0.1 elasticsearch==8.12.0 langchain==0.1.8 langchain-community==0.0.21 langchain-core==0.1.42 sentence-transformers==2.3.1
